```{r}
create_demo_card <- function(title, description, repo_name, icon) {
  cat(
    '::: {.demo-card}\n',
    '::: {.demo-card-icon}\n',
    '<i class="fa ', icon, ' fa-lg" aria-hidden="true" style="color: #00bc8c;"></i>\n',
    ':::\n',
    '::: {.demo-card-content}\n',
    '### ', title, '\n\n',
    description, '\n',
    ':::\n',
    '::: {.demo-card-button}\n',
    '<a href="https://github.com/surveydown-dev/', repo_name, '" class="d-inline-block">\n',
    '  <img class="github-badge" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/view_on-GitHub-00bc8c?style=for-the-badge&logo=GitHub" alt="View on GitHub">\n',
    '</a>\n',
    ':::\n',
    ':::\n\n',
    sep = ""
  )
}
```

```{r}
build_demo_grid <- function(df) {
  for (i in 1:nrow(df)) {
    create_demo_card(
      title = df$title[i],
      description = df$description[i],
      repo_name = df$repo_name[i],
      icon = df$icon[i]
    )
    cat('\n')
  }
}
```
